data.title: David Archuleta & Mormon Tabernacle Choir Glad Christmas Tidings with David Archuleta on Collectors' Choice Music
meta_keywords: glad christmas tidings with david archuleta
glad christmas tidings with david archuleta
data.meta_description: 2011 holiday release from the American Idol contestant and the world famous Mormon Tabernacle Choir. Each year, the Christmas concert presented by the Morm
data.text: 2011 holiday release from the American Idol contestant and the world famous Mormon Tabernacle Choir. Each year, the Christmas concert presented by the Mormon Tabernacle Choir and Orchestra at Temple Square is seen by more than 85,000 people live and by millions more via television broadcast. It is a full-scale production featuring world-class musicians, soloists, dancers, narrators, and music that leaves viewers in awe year after year. The Choir was joined by pop music sensation and platinum recording artist David Archuleta. David's clear and powerful vocals paired with the Choir's classic Christmas sound makes this album a must-have for any Christmas collection.
